h1: Are you making a claim against more than 1 'respondent'?
p1: You can claim against more than 1 respondent if you think you’ve been treated unlawfully on a personal as well as an organisational level.
p2: For example, if you’re making your claim against an employer as well as someone who worked there - you can claim against multiple respondents.
radio1: Yes - I’m making a claim against more than 1 respondent
radio2: No - I’m making a claim against 1 single respondent
